reviews.review: Ставь лукас, если пишешь обзор ради значка ;D
the cs:go for old school kids
The best, in my opinion, Counter-Strike
This game is lit recommended 10/10 just watch out for noob with awp's
cs go dan ban yemekten bıkanlar bu oyuna baksın tavsiyem :)
В этой игре нельзя просто так  остановиться и уйди спать, в неё хочется играть и играть на серверах на которых есть нормальные игроки)
Она старая но ещё осталось крутая.
Что то среднее между 1.6 и GO
Best game I have ever felt, nicer than Bill Cosby after a few cold ones.

Игра просто супер, столько ей лет, а графа еще актуальна. Очень интересна, пожалуй некогда не надоест. Геймплей просто на максимуме! Одобряю! Всем желаю в нее поиграть(хотя кого я обманываю... в нее уже все поиграли :D)
Still one of the most versatile games. Even after all these years it's fun to play.

Никто не любил cs source, когда она только вышла. Все продолжали играть в 1.6 и говорили, что сурс - кал. Но для меня эта игра слишком любимая, мы играли в нее дома, в компьютерных клубах и в школе на переменах, ох уж эти времена. Сейчас конечно же есть GO поэтому к source я уже не возвращаюсь, но эта игра, реально, супер классика.
CS系列一直陪伴我们的成长，没有他们我们的青春真的会缺了十分宝贵的东西
Вечная игра. Ни когда не устареет
Only game you need for bhop.
Игр стоит того,что бы ее купить!

Counter-Strike: Source combines the award-winning original team shooter Counter-Strike 1.6 technologies engine Orange box. Counter-Strike: Source has updated graphics, realistic physics and a completely revamped sound, weapons, player models (which at the time in 2004), all of this and more awaits you in the game from the company Valve. Counter-Strike: Source simply must take a prominent place in the collection of every fan of the genre "Action".

- beardATTACK @ fren
Best game ever. Good old days, we miss you
The best game ever. Never gets old.
这CS起源是从盗版V84玩起的。常年在娱乐服。最近打折就赶紧入了吧。经典中的经典。娱乐服老司机带带我~
Melhor jogo fps que ja joguei. Até agora não ouve igual.
keeps old men up in their sleep
I always come back to this game just because of how crazy the mods are (minigames, zombies, etc.).

la wea fome yo solo quiero mi insignia,
Amén.
This is an amazing game. It is fun to 1v1 your friends, or just play online.

this game is a classic and i love it it has all the original cool costom server side gammodes such as zombiemode surf and bhop and jailbreak and zombie escape racing this game was also the co prducer of garrysmod if it wasnt for CSS garrys mod wouldnt of existed
Counter Strike Source. A amazing game of time and dedication that will bring you to meet many great friends, or just looking to hava blast!
Always fun to go back and play
Amazing keeps me going on all types of modes :D good game
bestes game, lässt erinnerungen wach werden.

>Got the game in a sale after playing 600 hours in global offensive
<Played source
<Realised it was way better and there were no skins
<realised i have wasted 600 hours playing the worst cs
10/10 would waste 600 hours again.
Très bon jeux je le recommande à tous même si il date un peux :D
Classic, Simple, Easy, and no toxic community. Thank y'all

Love this game. A must have
I honestly think this game is still viable. Plenty of servers to play on and the graphics were amazing for the year 2004
